title: Treat Light Frostbite
brief: Safe rewarming techniques for light frostbite using body heat.
steps: Step 1: Use hands or mittens to warm frostbitten face and ears.
Step 2: Place frostbitten hands under your armpits for rewarming.
Step 3: Place frostbitten feet next to your buddy's stomach for warming.
Step 4: Assess severity - if feeling lost for only a short time, likely light frostbite.
warnings: If feeling has been lost for an extended time, assume deep frostbite.
Do not attempt to treat deep frostbite in field conditions.
Avoid thawing deep frostbite if there's risk of refreezing.
